name: normalize
description: Normalize columns to [0,1] per device using percentile-based min-max. Run with fit=true to compute and save params, then fit=false for incremental runs.

fit.description: If true, compute percentile params from all input data and save normalize_params.json. If false, load existing params (error if missing).

method.description: Normalization method: 'percentile' (robust, recommended) or 'minmax' (sensitive to outliers)

columns.description: Columns to normalize. Empty = all numeric columns in the domain.

clip.description: Clip normalized values to [0, 1]. Handles outliers beyond fit range.
